name: DollyRocket_UP2014548
description:
My game "Dolly Rocket" is a journey of people escaping their Homeworld from killer AI robots.

You must learn to adapt and overcome the threats that lay ahead, as you are after all, humanities last hope.

The game is a wild adventure using only 1 input (Up Arrow) from start to finish.

Tips

1. You're going to die a few times

2. Pay attention to gaps in the Killer robots, to progress 

Music From: NOVA Secession Studios
